conbody.p:
In the Design Studio (DS) Workbench application, projects are top-level containers that store and organize a projectâ€™s resources. When you create a new DS Workbench project, the application automatically creates the following folders in the
DS Navigator view pane to store the resources of the application's designers:
Domains (related to Domain Designer)
Fragments (related to Page Designer)
Menus (related to Menu Designer)
Modules (related to Page Designer)
Pageflows (related to Pageflow Designer)
Pages (related to Page Designer)
Rules (related to the Rule Designer)
Translation (related to Translation Editor)
Workflows (related to Workflow Designer).
Each designer will only contain its own model files (for example, the Domain Designer only contains model files of Domain Designer). Model files of each designer are organized using packages .
